contentrichtext.text: {{infobox UK place| |country = England |official_name= Ollerton |latitude= 53.287251 |longitude= -2.336489 |population = 323 |population_ref= ''(2001)'' |civil_parish= Ollerton |unitary_england= [[Cheshire East]] |lieutenancy_england= [[Cheshire]] |region= North West England |constituency_westminster= [[Tatton (UK Parliament constituency)|Tatton]] |post_town= KNUTSFORD |postcode_district = WA16 |postcode_area= WA |dial_code= 01565 |os_grid_reference= SJ776767 }} '''Ollerton''' is a village in the [[Cheshire East|Borough of Cheshire East]] and the ceremonial county of [[Cheshire]], [[England]]. It is situated approximately {{convert|2|mi|km}} south east of the town of [[Knutsford]], and has a population of 323.<ref>[http://www.neighbourhood.statistics.gov.uk/dissemination/viewFullDataset.do?instanceSelection=03070&productId=779&$ph=60_61&datasetInstanceId=3070&startColumn=1&numberOfColumns=8&containerAreaId=790336 Office for National Statistics : ''Census 2001 : Parish Headcounts : Macclesfield''] Retrieved 2009-12-01</ref> Local services are limited, and include a [[parish church|church]] which is within [[Marthall]], [[public house|pub]] and several postboxes. Other services such as the [[primary education|primary]] [[school]], [[post office]] and [[Retailing#Shops and stores|shop]] have closed down, due to many residents using services in Knutsford. Ollerton combined with the adjacent village of [[Marthall]], has a [[Parish councils in England|joint parish council]], elected every 3 years, though having very limited and symbolic powers. The villages share the new village hall in [[Marthall]], which was constructed in November 2009. Ollerton is thought to have come from the name '''Owlerton''' and is named in the [[Domesday Book]]. ==See also== *[[Ollerton Hall]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category|Ollerton, Cheshire}} *[http://www.ollertonwithmarthall.org.uk/ Ollerton official website] {{Cheshire, Cheshire East}} {{Cheshire}} {{Cheshire-geo-stub}} [[Category:Villages in Cheshire]] [[Category:Civil parishes in Cheshire]]
